body_content.explanation: the original form of cable television (= the system of sending television programmes along wires under the ground), in which televison signals are received by one large aerial (= piece of receiving equipment) and then broadcast by cable to individual houses in the area:
examples: The first commercial Community Antenna Television system was developed by John Watson in 1948.
She tried to sell the video footage to television stations, news organizations, and community antenna television services.
